Step into this whimsical whirlwind and discover what Molly is really escaping from and help her recover her memoryâ€”if you dare!

# ðŸ™€ Whimsical gameplay with perplexing puzzles   
Puzzle your way through perplexing challenges and lose yourself in an enchanting landscape where up is down, left is right, and nothing is quite as it seems (except when it is, and even then, it might not be).

{536085952412707}

Escaping Wonderland is a new chapter in the **Down the Rabbit Hole** saga, and an all-new story from the same developers who brought you the original, Cortopia Studios.

changelog.change_log:
Features
-Added hands for Molly when in first person

Gameplay
-Added tutorial instruction for exiting first person in pipe puzzle
-Added auto exit first person on pipe puzzle completion
-Added so that lightbulbs dance if diamond mine is complete
-Added shimmer effect to cult buttons
-Added cog visual variants to Twilight Acres
-Tweaked quest text for readability in storage room
-Tweaked ladder starting position in storage room

Bugs
-Tweaked uv to prevent light spilling in the ending door lightbeam
-Tweaked ladder snapping threshold in storage room
-Tweaked mipmap bias in character shader for shaper resolution of texture
-Tweaked popup point position in machine room 5 for Willpower Plant.
-Fixed dodo face getting stuck on angry during conversion with Mr.Mole
-Fixed issue where menu page would not reset when returning to title screen
-Fixed banter setup in the queens tent. The queen will no longer respond to your interactions once she has left.
-Fixed issue where player could interrupt machine room cutscene by interacting with other objects in the room
-Fixed SFX setup in machine room
-Fixed Twilight Acres interaction button remaining even if interaction was finished.
-Fixed issue where hand poses on the mirrors in mirror mire would be incorrect.
-Fixed issue where player could lock themselves if trying to leave stove top room with Dodo and Molly simultaneously
-Fixed issue where Cheshire Cat smoke VFX would play twice consecutively 
-Fixed null ref issue when using elevator but not reloading scene
